spec_data.Name: perl-Lexical-Persistence
spec_data.Description:
Lexical::Persistence does a few things, all related. Note that all the
behaviors listed here are the defaults. Subclasses can override nearly
every aspect of Lexical::Persistence's behavior.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:42:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Persistent lexical variable values for arbitrary calls
